title: Virtual Assistant – E-commerce Customer Service & More
job_overview:
???? Virtual Assistant – E-commerce Customer Service

We’re looking for a Virtual Assistant who’s sharp, reliable, and great with people. Someone with experience in e-commerce support and a natural feel for friendly, helpful communication.

You’ll be the first point of contact for our customers – answering emails, solving problems, and making sure every shopper has a smooth experience. You’ll also support with simple admin tasks like updating tracking info or forwarding reviews to the team.

We are looking for someone for around 40 hours a week, your salary is based on experience.

Please watch the Loom video to know more about the job and the instructions on how to apply: Upgrade to see actual info

I look forward to your application.

Kind regards,
Tom
